name: Stamp Boy
detailed_description:
Stamp Boy is a retro style puzzle-platformer game about hero save princess from evil monster with only his stamp ability. Make your way further and further to get close to the evil monster and defeat bosses. And also collect Orbs in every level to unlock something unknow. No random generation in the world, every levels are by handwork.

The Amazing Stamp Ability - Reliable stamp ability could make you live form evil monsters.

No Random Generation Levels - Every level is only depend your skill to pass!

More than 30 different levels and more than 4 horrific boss waiting for you!

if you like pixel art and puzzle platformer, if you don't like random generation, maybe you will like this! Hope you will enjoy it!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
